import ctypes import wx, sys
class CustomWidget(wx.StaticText): def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs): self.initialized = False super(CustomWidget, self).__init__(*args, **kwargs) self.Message = None
InitBaseHMI = Class_HMIFrame.__init__ def InitHMI(self,*args,**kargs): InitBaseHMI(self, *args,**kargs) print('Initialisation changed!') try: self.SetSize((200, 200)) self.SetTitle("Nex HMI") print(self.power_btn) print(':)') except: print(':(')
Class_HMIFrame.__init__ = InitHMI
